data.oai_dc:dc: Floral morphs and flower measurements of P. parviflora in the Pantanal Wetlands

sheet1: Geographic coordinates, floral-morph frequencies, inflorescence counts, population-size estimates for sampled populations of Pontederia parviflora in the Pantanal Wetlands. sheet2: Measurements of flower length, petal width, perianth-tube aperture and base of corolla width, and sex organs (l, m and s denotes anthers levels) for the three floral morphs of Pontederia parviflora in five populations sampled in the Pantanal wetlands, sheet3: Number of senesced flowers, open flowers, buds and total flower number of inflorescences of the three floral morphs of Pontederia parviflora, sheet4: number of aborted fruit and seed set in infructescences of the three floral morphs in five populations in the Pantanal, sheet5: Mean pollen size and pollen number of the l-, m- and s-anthers of the L-, M-, and S-morph of Pontederia parviflora sampled in five populations in the Pantanal.
disassortative mating|frequency-dependent selection|male fertility|floral morph ratios|Pantanal|tristyly
